overview: Meir brings over 20 years of experience in software development and management to Zoomix. Prior to joining Zoomix, Meir served as Vice President of R&D and Site Manager at Illuminator, where he was responsible for all site activity, product architecture, R&D and customer support. Illuminator, which acquired by EMC in 2007, was a leading provider of enterprise application recovery audit and control software solutions. Prior to Illuminator, Meir was Vice President of R&D and General Manager at Traiana, a software company providing global banks and brokers with enterprise solutions that improve the business efficiency, where he was responsible for managing the entire product lifecycle. Prior to Traiana, Meir held variety of development management positions at Sapiens (NASDAQ: SPNS) a leading global provider of innovative business solutions that modernize business processes. Meir holds a B.Sc. in Mathematics and Computer Science from Tel-Aviv University.
